bwwExcerpt: : All shows open in a temporal context they can't always control. "Six," especially at just 80 intermission-less minutes and with low costs, an existent YouTube fame, a gently progressive sensibility and a youthful target demographic, is as well-suited to this moment as any piece of live entertainment.
